A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Subversion\, being surprised\, seeing the unexpected\, all these things are nice. While watching the film for the first time it felt very exciting. The moment it ended I was ready to declare TLJ the best SW film ever...but then I started thinking... so many things don't make sense. I'm not the type of person to throw logic out the window for the sake of a cheap thrill. If a movie's plot doesn't make sense and has inconsistencies with the established lore than it's a bad movie and problematic for the franchise even if it felt good and exciting the first time I watched it. The second time it felt like subversion for the sake of subversion.
